reviews.review_msg: If you do your readings before class like you are supposed to, this class will make sense and will be really interesting. If you don't do your readings and don't show up to class, of course you won't understand the class organization and you will get a poor grade. Dr. Read is a good prof, he's nice, and funny.
i enjoyed every bit of it. thanks u :)

Awesome class. Dr. Read definately knows his material well, and makes the course challenge, and informative. I would definately recommend this to anybody interested in the field. The man knows what he's talking about.

he's got good intentions for getting the material across but flies by so fast there's no way to catch all that's important. he does not give any indication of what's more important so you feel you have to remember everything.

This is the first time this course was taught and it was not what I expected. Dr. Read made the course material really dry and I found him to be disorganized. Assignments NOT explained well and TA's marked them really hard. Would only recommend this course if it was taught by a different prof (which it is next semester)

Prof seems nice enough, but his course is REALLY unorganized.  Also, his instructions (eg. guidelines for the paper assignment) are really unclear.. His exams are hard and the papers are marked hard too...  Wouldn't recommend this course at all...

The material in this class is difficult, and the main reason that people don't do well is because they don't show up, not because Dr. Read is mean. If you show up, listen and do all the readings, you will learn and do well. The material is extremely interesting, and Dr. Read is super nice, very helpful, and very knowledgable about the material.

Best professor I've ever had!! I was in his psyc 250 class as well. He provides the reading materials via pdf files (even the textbook he wrote), his lectures are engaging and interesting and he always has good stories to go along with the material. His exams are very fair as well! I seriously recommend taking a class with him!!

Hart is the best professor on campus. He is witty, knowledgeable and very helpful. I have taken all the courses I can with him, including a directed studies - alll of which I would recommend to anyone. His classes are very comprehendable, and attending his lectures was actually a highlight of my day. TAKE HIS COURSES!

Best professor ever! Made class interesting and just talked for 2 hours but his stories were funny! Only complainant about this course is that you do a group term paper and a group presentation in tutorial and I don't like group work.

He is a very entertaining and easy going prof. keeps you awake at 830. Material is interesting. One complain I have is that exams are very short-a 40% exam is only out of 40. The questions are also focused on little statistics.
Great prof! Very understanding and helpful, and also quite entertaining, even at 8:30 in the morning:) Very personable, I would take another class just because he was teaching it.
